column4: so 8.10 killed my gnome... how do i get it to work again?  it just gives me a black screen but still shows the pointer
can anyone help me fix an 8.10 upgrade problem that gives me a black screen instead of gnome?\
oh no!  nothing gnome works!  not even gnome-terminal!
:argh: ubuntu!  how are you going to wave this fance release infront of me then ruin everything!
how do i downgrade to the 8.04... that works
i blame this on you, it is your fault!
do you know how it happened?  and what is exactly happening with your gnome?
that's really weird.  did you do an upgrade, or fresh install?
upgrade... and it was working earlier too!  but i rebooted and now gnome doesn't work... i mean, fluxbox (what im currently using) works fine, but gnome is shot
you could try a fresh install.
i know i could, but if im going to be fresh installing anything, it will be debian because ubuntu has betrayed me one too many times
well you can't give up now!!
well you can't.  sudo dpkg --set-selections < my-packages and reinstall ubuntu fresh
